entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind southwest 80 km/h gusting to 110 diminishing to 60 gusting to 80 near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow this evening. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 late this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northwest 20 in the morning then light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
